text: Don't Mess with Bill is a 1980 Canadian short documentary film about Canadian martial arts pioneer Bill Underwood, produced by Pen Densham. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1980 films Category:1980 documentary films Category:1980 short films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American documentary films Category:Short documentary films Category:Martial arts films
title: Don't Mess with Bill (film)
